meanings.definition: A device used for pressing grapes to extract juice.
meanings.sent1: The winery workers used the winepresses to make grape juice.
meanings.sent2: The old winepresses in the vineyard were still functional.
meanings.sent3: The winepresses decided to take a break from all the grape squeezing.
meanings.sent4: The winepresses hummed a tune as they worked tirelessly in the vineyard.
meanings.sent5: The shiny winepresses gleamed in the sunlight as they did their job.

meanings.definition: The act of pressing grapes to extract juice.
meanings.sent1: The winepresses were hard at work extracting juice from the grapes.
meanings.sent2: After the harvest, the winepresses were busy with grape pressing.
meanings.sent3: The winepresses celebrated a successful day of grape squeezing.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of the winepresses filled the vineyard.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh grape juice filled the air around the winepresses.

meanings.definition: The location where grapes are pressed to extract juice.
meanings.sent1: The winery had a special room dedicated to the winepresses.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the size of the winepresses area.
meanings.sent3: The winepresses area became a popular spot for grape enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The winepresses location was always bustling during harvest season.
meanings.sent5: The vineyard tour included a stop at the winepresses site.
